Post Elimination Chamber 2017 Match Discussion: WWE Championship Elimination Chamber Match - Dean Ambrose Vs. Baron Corbin Vs. The Miz Vs. Bray Wyatt Vs. AJ Styles Vs. John Cena (c)
WRITING.TEXT:
Bray Wyatt wins after last eliminating AJ Styles

- Baron Corbin eliminated by Dean Ambrose with a rollup
- Dean Ambrose eliminated by The Miz after Baron Corbin laid Ambrose out
- The Miz eliminated by John Cena after an Attitude Adjustment
- John Cena eliminated by Bray Wyatt after Sister Abigail
- AJ Styles eliminated by Bray Wyatt after Sister Abigail

WRITING.TEXT: Becky Lynch wins via rollup

WRITING.TITLE: Update on TNA Creative team and producers Contract Updates
WRITING.TEXT:
PwInsider Elite Audio/Mike Johnson reported that going forward the TNA Creative team will be Jeff Jarrett as Executive Producer/Head of Creative with Dutch Mantell and Scott D'Amore underneath him.
They are also looking into hiring a script writer who can write a format for the shows.
The producers helping backstage will be Abyss, Jeremy Borash, and Rockstar Spud.
He said he's not even sure if Drew Galloway has been offered a new deal by the company, calling them bat-shit crazy not too. He also said that are still in talks with Matt and Jeff Hardy about new deals but there is a lot going into that as far as the Broken Universe and it not really being in the Jarrett/Mantell wheelhouse of booking.
You mean this event isn't Hell in a Cell?

WRITING.TITLE: [Future Spoiler] Idea pitched for former WWE worker in the weeks ahead
WRITING.TEXT: PWInsider Elite Audio and Mike Johnson are reporting that ideas have been pitched for Gillberg to appear in the coming weeks. Also said that he is not sure if/when it does happen but he has heard that they are pitching ideas for him and they have contacted him about coming in as well.

Yeah, for me, this is the first time that I'm happy the football season is over in a long time. Even when we did really bad I was just ready for more. This one took too much out of me. I'm glad I don't have to think about it or watch it for the next few months.
I'm numb. That's all I got. The last four months have been a lot of shit piled on shit for me, I wanted something to celebrate and all I got was more shit. I'm numb.
Holding. Holding. Holding. Fuck you, Pick 6.

The Patriots winning on the TV. Also I'm gonna be the only one who actually watches football at my girlfriends families house and if anyone even makes a squeak about the Patriots winning I'm gonna flip some tables (but not really.)

WRITING.TITLE: People outside of the US, what were the big things you learned in history class?

WRITING.TEXT: Very true. "Who is this bozo?" is too good... People know bozo.

There has been ELEVEN world wars?
Edit: I just realized that with Donald Trump as our president if I come back to this comment in four years, I might not be far off.
My old friend from back home, things Just drifted apart after awhile of spending almost every day with each other and other friends getting in the way. I miss that girl a ton.
Finding stacks of old porn magazines in the shared backyards in my childhood home in Queens, NY.
People would be looking at a lot more photographs and then they'd start to laugh. They might even wonder what's on Joey's head. Or why their eyes are so red.
It was that satisfying?
I wear shorts a ton so... Just a camera.
